testcase.name: Fill 'SignUp' form
testcase.system-out: And Enter "TestStudent" in "first_name" field...............................passed And Enter "Qa" in "last_name" field.........................................passed And Select "American Medical Academy - Main Campus - Nursing" for School-Campus-Discipline.passed And Enter "10/2021" date in "graduation_date" calender......................passed

testcase.classname: Fill 'SignUp' form & get User id & password
testcase.name: Fill Mailing Address - 'required by clinical sites'
testcase.system-out: And Enter "75 Rock Maple" in "c_address_1" field............................passed And Enter "St.Santa Ana" in "c_address_2" field.............................passed And Select "CA" from "c_state" dropdown.....................................passed And Select "Holy City" from "c_city" dropdown...............................passed And Enter "92707" in "c_zip" field..........................................passed And Enter "(812)345-6789" in "uphone" field.................................passed And Enter "email" address for 'Registration'................................passed And Enter "email_confirm" address for 'Verification'........................passed And Enter "Testing123" in "password" field..................................passed And Enter "Testing123" in "password_confirm" field..........................passed

testcase.classname: Fill 'SignUp' form & get User id & password
testcase.name: Fill 'Credit Card Information' for payment
testcase.system-out: And Enter "4111111111111111" in "card-number" field.........................passed And Select "2020" from "exp-year" dropdown..................................passed And Enter "123" in "ccv" field..............................................passed And Select "same_mailing_address" Checkbox..................................passed And Select "agreement_checkbox" Checkbox....................................passed When Click on "AGREE AND REGISTER" "submit_button"..........................passed Then Verify "Success" model window open.....................................passed And Click on "OK" button....................................................passed

testcase.name: Data driving for valid 'sign-in'.
testcase.system-out: And Enter email address in "username" field for SignIn......................passed And Enter "Testing123" in "password" field for SignIn.......................passed When Click on 'Login' button................................................passed Then Verify it Redirected to "My Account" Page..............................passed And Verify the page Title "Rotation Manager Software" text..................passed

testcase.name: Open 'My School Files' panel & Upload Mandataory File
testcase.system-out: When Click on "My School Files" Menu........................................passed Then Verify it Redirected to "My School Files" Page.........................passed And Verify "My School Files" menu option is highlighted.....................passed
